mapper.insert: insert into tb_community(article_seq, article_title, article_content, article_cnt, mb_email, mb_nick, article_type, article_likes, article_wdate, article_rdate) values(tb_community_SEQ.nextval, #{article_title}, #{article_content}, #{article_cnt}, #{mb_email}, #{mb_nick}, #{article_type}, #{article_likes}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select article_seq, article_title, article_content, article_cnt, mb_email, mb_nick, article_type, article_likes, article_wdate, article_rdate from tb_community where article_type='공지사항' order by article_seq desc
mapper.update: update tb_community set article_cnt = article_cnt + 1 where article_seq = #{article_seq}
mapper.select: select * from tb_community where article_seq=#{article_seq} order by desc
